info.name: API testing from Swagger on Staging-be-ecom.com

item.name: (1)  Tests On User Signup
Positive test cases
	As a user, I should be able to sign up with a Valid Email that I have not used to sign up on this website before, Name, and Password.

exec: //Comments: This automation will only pass if you manually add a new email address that was never used before to sign up.
//comments: the best practise is to use FakerJS but I chose to use data driven here.
pm.test("As a user, I should be able to sign up with a Valid Email that I have not used to sign up on this website before, Name, and Password.", function () {

item.name: Negative test cases
	As a user, I should not be able to sign up more than once with one email address I have already registered with.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign up more than once with one email address I have already registered with.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign up without an email.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign up without an email.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign up without a Password.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign up without a Password.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign up without a Name.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign up without a Name.", function () {

item.name: (2)  Tests On User OTP verification
Positive test cases
	As a user, I should receive the OTP in the given email.

exec: //comments: Automating this requires advanced knowledge. Therefore, I am keeping this as a failed test case.
pm.test("As a user, I should receive the OTP in the given email.", function () {

item.name: Negative test cases
	As a user, I should not be able to use the same OTP more than once.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to use the same OTP more than once.", function () {

item.name: (3)  Tests On User sign in
Positive test cases
	As a user, I should be able to sign in with a valid email that is registered and a password

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to sign in with a valid email that is registered and a password,", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should be able to sign in within 500ms after putting my valid email and password.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to sign in within 500ms after putting my valid email and password.", function () {

item.name: Negative test cases
	As a user, I should not be able to sign in without signing up.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign in without signing up.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign in without a password.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign in without a password..", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign in without an email.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign in without an email.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to sign in with the wrong email or password.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to sign in with the wrong email or password.", function () {

item.name: (4)  Test on User profile update
Positive test cases
	As a user, I should be able to add my mobile number to my profile.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to add my mobile number to my profile.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should be able to add my name to the profile.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to add my name to the profile.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should be able to add my gender to the profile.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to add my gender to the profile.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should be able to add my birthdate to the profile.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to add my birthdate to the profile.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should be able to Update my Name, Number, Gender, and DOB in my profile.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to Update my Name, Number, Gender, and DOB in my profile.", function () {

item.name: Negative test cases
	As a user, I should not be able to write my gender, I should only be able to select from specific 3. Male/Female/Other

exec: //Test fail as I was able to write my gender
pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to write my gender, I should only be able to select from specific 3, Male, Female, Other.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should not be able to select any future date in Date of birth. I should only be able to select 14 years past dates.

exec: //Test failed as I was able to select Future DOB
pm.test("As a user, I should not be able to select any future date in Date of birth. I should only be able to select 14 years past dates.", function () {

item.name: (5) Test on Search bar
Positive test cases
	As a user, I should be able to type anything on the search bar and search it.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should be able to type anything on the search bar and search it.", function () {

item.name: 	As a user, I should see products if I don’t type anything and click the search button.

exec: pm.test("As a user, I should see products if I don’t type anything and click the search button.", function () {
"Denim Slim Fit Jeans Pant for Men",
"name": "Denim Slim Fit Jeans Pant for Men",
"name": "Denim Slim Fit Jeans Pant for Men",
"name": "Denim Slim Fit Jeans Pant for Men",

item.name: Negative test cases
	As a user, I should not see an error for clicking the search button without typing anything.
